long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Broken keyboards, buggy web-apps, and mistakenly pressing the wrong button are part of the many reasons why control-c and cmd-c don't work. And when you've copied the wrong thing, it's distracting and you waste time. That's why this app gives you an alert at the bottom right of the screen when you've copied text. Whenever you copy a piece of code, this extension will confirm that you have actually copied. 

There are known issues with getting alerts from google docs.
